data.name: sn_enc_hex
data.desc: Encode arbitrary data to HEX with 0x prefix

output.desc: Returns prefixed hex encoded string. Example 0x11211221

data.name: sn_split
data.desc: Takes in the operation name and its outputs, then splits in to N copies of the same operation with output values.

output.desc: Returns the object with *k* and *v* keys, where *k* is op name and *v* the output value.

data.name: sn_json_enc
data.desc: Wrapper of JSON.stringify().

output.desc: Returns SnByteArray of json string.

data.name: sn_json_dec
data.desc: Wrapper of JSON.parse()

data.name: sn_identity
data.desc: What comes in that comes out, identity function, must be a parent of the USER operation. Only one child is accepted.

data.name: sn_match_all
data.desc: This operation must have children ops. **ALL** the outputs of children ops must be the same in order to proceed.

output.desc: Returns true, if all match or throws an error if some match.

data.name: sn_match_none
data.desc: This operation must have children ops. **NONE** the outputs of children ops must be the same in order to proceed.

output.desc: Returns true, if none match or throws an error if some match.

data.name: sn_multihash
data.desc: Generic blake2b-256 multihash operation.

output.desc: Returns the Multihash buffer as SnByteArray.

data.name: sn_file
data.desc: Reads the file from given path (data) and returns the buffer. RAW file buffer for other ops to use.

output.desc: Returns the File Buffer.

data.desc: Create QR Code
data.name: sn_create_qrcode

output.desc: Return QRCode image

data.desc: Create the Ownership Claims from the existing PoE from the Sensio Network.
data.name: sn_create_ownership_claims

output.desc: Return the list of the Ownership Claims

data.desc: Save the given statements to the Sensio Network. This operation waits until the records are in finalized state. Accepts the list of claims with the list of signatures for each claim. Mapping is done with the index of the list so `param1[0]` and `param2[0]`. If there are mismatches in the either of the params this operation will fail. Meaning that `param1.length === param2.length`
data.name: sn_save_statements

output.desc: Return the List of signed statement IDs

data.desc: Sign the claims and return the tuple of claims and their signatures
data.name: sn_user_sign_claims

output.desc: Return the tuple of claims and their signatures

data.desc: Take the photo of the QRCode and do the verification of equality. If the verification is a successes the coperation will continue, if not user will be asked to resubmit the image. The photo taken MUST NOT BE MODIFIED, RESIZED AND MUST BE IN JPG OR JPEG. Medium or low size is better than large 10MB files. You can choose that in the camera settings
data.name: sn_take_photo_and_upload_qrcode

output.desc: Return the QRCode data if it passes the decoding and verification.

data.name: sn_cid
data.desc: Generic CID, defaults to base32 and dag-cbor for Any kind of data.

output.desc: CID string converted into SnByteArray

data.name: sn_multihash
data.desc: Generic blake2b-256 multihash operation.

output.desc: Returns the Multihash buffer as SnByteArray.

data.name: sn_image_metadata_hash
data.desc: Hash of full unchanged metadata buffer (or similar). Without raw pixels. The hashing is done via multihash using the hashing key to create a hash. Figure out how to do it with the ops that are not children, like use snCid

output.desc: Hash of full unchanged metadata buffer (or similar). Without raw pixels

data.desc: Extract All Image Metadata
data.name: sn_image_metadata

output.desc: Returns the metadata as SnByteArray and decoded as SnImageMetadata. Accessible as `[exif|iptc|xmp|icc].TAG_NAME`

data.name: sn_file
data.desc: Reads the file from given path (data) and returns the buffer. RAW file buffer for other ops to use.

output.desc: Returns the File Buffer.

output.desc: Returns the metadata as SnByteArray and decoded as SnImageMetadata. Accessible as `[exif|iptc|xmp|icc].TAG_NAME`

data.desc: Reads the file from given path (data) and returns the buffer. RAW file buffer for other ops to use.

output.desc: Returns the File Buffer.

data.desc: Perceptual hash calculation, currently implementing http://blockhash.io/
data.name: sn_image_phash

output.desc: Return binary representation of phash 0011101011

data.desc: Reads the file from given path (data) and returns the buffer. RAW file buffer for other ops to use.

output.desc: Returns the File Buffer.

data.desc: Calculate content id of the raw pixels
data.name: sn_image_raw_pixels_hash

output.desc: Return content id of the raw pixels

data.desc: Reads the file from given path (data) and returns the buffer. RAW file buffer for other ops to use.

output.desc: Returns the File Buffer.
